name: Dreamy Water Bubbles
outcome: [AttackerName] performs a graceful magical gesture, filling the air around [TargetName] and herself with a multitude of glimmering water bubbles! They bob up and down softly, reflecting the moonlight on [TargetHisOrHer] body before popping all at once, momentarily flooding the night skies with a sparkly glow!
miss: [AttackerName] performs a graceful magical gesture, filling the air around [TargetName] with a multitude of glimmering water bubbles, but a sudden gust of wind blows them all away!
statusOutcome: The beautiful glimmering spell weaves around [TargetName]'s thoughts, leaving [TargetHimOrHer] overfilled with hopeless adoration for [AttackerName]!
